mapper.select: select ag.id gridId, edmi.material, ag.x, ag.y, ag.z, ag.pop, ag.sensitive_area sensitiveArea, ag.water_zoning waterZoning, ag.grid_use_type waterZoning, ag.acreage waterZoning, ag.eco_value ecoValue, accs.code scenarioCode, edmi.emission_mode_type emissionModeType, gc.concentration from grid_concentration gc inner join assess_gird ag on ag.id = gc.grid_id and ag.valid = 1 and ag.bis_code = #{bisCode} inner join ent_diffusion_model_info edmi on edmi.id = gc.info_id and edmi.valid = 1 and edmi.ent_id = #{entId} left join accident_scenario accs on accs.id = edmi.scenario_id and accs.valid = 1 where gc.valid = 1 order by ag.x, ag.y
